Key Match Events: Sean Murphy hit a two-run homer
Marcell Ozuna trotted home on a throwing error after his first stolen base since 2022
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals came in with their magic number at one to clinch their first playoff appearance since winning the 2015 World Series.
The Braves began the night one game behind Arizona and the New York Mets in the NL wild-card race.
Post-Match Reflections: Max Fried said walking off the field to a huge cheer from the crowd at Truist Park was emotional.
Fried has spent his entire career with the Braves, but heâ€™s set to become a free agent after the World Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals still got a chance to celebrate their first postseason berth since 2015.
The Braves won behind Max Fried and Sean Murphy, but the Royals still got to celebrate.
Others: The game was played in Atlanta, and the Royals were playing at Truist Park.
Royals starter Brady Singer allowed two runs on four hits with three walks and five strikeouts.
